extension.name: Sync for Google Apps
extension.description: This extension syncs the contacts in CiviCRM with the Contacts Directory in Google Apps.
extension.comments: Please use the 'Administer / System Settings / CiviCRM sync for Google Apps' menu to configure this extension once installed. Per Google's restrictions, this extension can only work with Google Apps for Business or Education accounts. If you do have a free Google Apps account, you will need to upgrade.
